website_summaries.verdict: A hunting slingshot that is designed to deliver unmatched strength and durability.
pros: Ergonomic design helps you grip slingshot comfortably
Solid steel body delivers supreme durability
cons: Flashlight is flimsy and sometimes stops working

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY.. First of all it seems to be made of some weak cheap bendable metal. I've hit my hand multiple times even though im experienced with slingshots. Its velocity is like a weak bb gun. This product is the absolute worst thing I bought. As you can see its hit its frame multiple times, Ive replaced the rubber on the second day after the 9th use. Of course this product came from china would expect nothing less from these scammers...
customer_reviews.author: Natalia Estrada

customer_reviews.title: For what you pay it is way worth it
customer_reviews.text: Has some flash in-between two milled pieces but had no effect on performance. It’s a neat design but solid AF I like the three piece sling. I bought it for a survival kit to use on small game instead of a bow. I mean it is accurate up to 50 feet for sure i am blowing holes in cans with the plastic target balls. Also has flashlight and magnets to hold balls
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well built
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had a chance to use the slingshot yet.We had a problem with squirrels and raccoons in our fruit trees, grape vines and bird feeders. My husband was looking for a non-lethal solution so we decided a slingshot with the clay pellets would work. I will update when we use it.
customer_reviews.author: Leith

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Very strong and comfortable. Very fast and accurate. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Good shyt
customer_reviews.text: This product was well made and actually had some speed and power in the sling. Thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: Price Slayah

customer_reviews.title: a very well thought out slingshot.
customer_reviews.text: this is a generation beyond the old wrist rocket slingshots. I have no idea if it would kill a little varmit (like a rat) but is sure is accurate
customer_reviews.author: Swampguy

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit
customer_reviews.text: There are several negative reviews about this thing being junk but I dont see it that way. For what it costs it's a bargain IMHO
customer_reviews.author: HOMESAVER

customer_reviews.title: pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: this thing is a blast, and the tac light is actually useful! One of the most entertaining 22.95 i've ever spent. also comes with extra parts to keep the fun going if something breaks. pleasantly surprised by the quality of a gift bought as a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Byron Livermore

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, accurate, rapid reload with with magnets.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great slingshot, the stabilizing bar that anchors to your forearm holds the slingshot steady for more accurate shooting and the magnets hold the ammo in a position for more rapid reload. I find the rubber tubing to be a good tension for my purposes, they are not too tight and not too loose. I shoot the buzzards that land on my roof, you can hear a thick "thud" when they get hit but it doesn't kill them (my aim is to only scare them off my roof).
customer_reviews.author: Always Reading

customer_reviews.title: well made,sturdy
customer_reviews.text: it took some practice to get use to one of these again. seems to be holding up well ,structurally sound so far. i like it.
customer_reviews.author: John Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Stgroong built sling-shot
customer_reviews.text: This is the best built commercial sling shot I have seen. It shoots very strong and accurately. For the money you can not go wrong in buying one of these. Shipping is very fast and it comes with a second set of bands and a few pieces of ammo. The light would be great if you hunted after dark. I live in the heart of the Mobile River Delta in Mobile, Alabama and we go inside at dark. There are things in this swamp that will get you at night!!!!!! I do not care for the clay pellets, they seem too light for accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: Randall P.

customer_reviews.title: This is a real professional slingshot...no doubt!!!
customer_reviews.text: This slingshot is a step below a .22 rifle...very powerful. If you fiddle with it long enough you can aim it with the sights on the left/right side. I hope the bands last for a while. This product is very sturdy and strong.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford L King

customer_reviews.title: Great slingshot.
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with the product, it is well built and folds for convenient storage. I like the way it "fits" my hand and the only thing I need to do is practice my aim, lol. It came with a small flashlight and mount for it along with some pellets. Overall I am pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian M Perez

customer_reviews.title: Really an nice Slingshot
customer_reviews.text: Its heavy frame is excellent generally well built. Very accurate from the first shot. Only negative is the wrist support is floppy, would be nice if it would lock into place, that makes it difficult to do a quick shot at times. I will add some material to make it a friction fit. I do recommend the 1200 clay pellets too, you will need them if your trying to scare the crows and starlings away from your feeders.
customer_reviews.author: C.P. Sanibel

customer_reviews.title: Works great, with 1 flaw.
customer_reviews.text: 1 issue I have is something I saw right away from the pictures. The middle rubber bands connect on the inside, so whenever I shoot they become dislodged about 50% of the time. I had to rig them in place by wrapping a couple of regular rubber bands around the hooks and around those center bands. Since I did that it is working great, but this is something I shouldn't have to do.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S

customer_reviews.title: Total Failure and unsafe
customer_reviews.text: This slingshot is dangerous because the thin rubber bands break easily. After just a dozen shots, cracks developed in them and the offset torque pulled the shot off to one side which bounced off the frame and actually went 50 feet behind me almost hitting my head. The frame is really beautiful but it's a shame that the bands are way too small and weak. I decided that only one band should be used instead of multiple bands due to unequal torque. I replaced this with a Barnett Cobra which works very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ellington

customer_reviews.title: excellent value for the money
customer_reviews.text: this is an excellent value for the money. it came disassembled but was very easy to put together even for me! I want to use it to discourage squirrels from our bird feeders and also to improve my archery skills. (injured shoulder is not back to bow-strength yet).
customer_reviews.author: h. prints

customer_reviews.title: Bands Break Very Quickly and Easily
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate that the slingshot comes with an extra launching band, but it is useless when the first one breaks before reaching a couple dozen shots and the backup breaks after the same amount. Maybe they provide a second launching band because they are aware the first one will not last long. I was using heavy but reasonable shot, but a slingshot that describes itself as "professional" and "heavy duty" cannot make that claim when it breaks so quickly and easily. Also when each band broke it caused painful injury to my thumb holding the grip and to my face with the backlash.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick JF

customer_reviews.title: powerful!
customer_reviews.text: Looking forward to adult toy! Feel good. Infrared targeting equipment, very professional! Power is big enough!
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Break it in
customer_reviews.text: I was a little unsure after reading some of the reviews but for the price I paid I am happy with it . One of the big concerns I had again from reviews was that the leather pocket on the rubber bands broke pretty quick I found if you just break it in and don’t pull back to far at first it tends to be durable I’ve gotten 30 shots out of mine And the more I shoot it the more I can pull back without breaking the leather part of the sling; all in all pretty good deal for the price
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like decent quality initially, but both elastic bands snapped within 5 minutes and the capped nuts holding the brace together immediately fell off. Sent back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous - possible ricochet hazard
customer_reviews.text: Well built but very dangerous. I loved the design and craftsman ship and have a great look. However the V for the clearance for the projectile to shoot through is very shallow so if you are not perfectly aligned it is very easy to hot the fram with the projectile. The braces need to be deeper Nd maybe wider for clearance . Also I feel the multiple tubes of elastic band tend to get tangled more than the traditional wrist rocket . I think a after some redesign this could be greatly improved .
customer_reviews.author: Happy Boater

customer_reviews.title: Packs a pretty good punch
customer_reviews.text: Very fast and as accurate as the shooter. Comes with an extra set of tubes, which is nice. It also comes with three Allen wrenches, two of which don't fit screws on the thing, but the third fits the flashlight bracket. I guess you can look at the other two as "freebies" to use on other stuff around the house or shop... Typical Chinese craftsmanship, so I'm sure it won't last long, but for the price, I think it's fine. That's why we keep buying things from China anyway, right?
customer_reviews.author: Know-it-all

customer_reviews.title: Cheap junk
customer_reviews.text: The quiver magnet that holds the extra ammo (steal bearings) is very weak. When you shoot the sling shot the bearings held by the magnet fly all over. The 6 rubers bands are useless. Better off with the 2 bands normally used on the wrist rocket. I consider this cheap china crap.
customer_reviews.author: G44931K

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I like the extras. Bands, ammo, etc. I like the design. One of the bands broke on the 2nd shot. I tied it back on but I'm not expecting it to last long. So those "extras" seem really necessary as it's probably not well built. It LOOKS nice but doesn't feel particularly sturdy. Which I would have written off had a band not broke immediately. Seller offered to send a replacement band but was asking for some personal info so o declined. Overall I'm glad I got it, as a birthday gift for a child, but if you want a really well built slingshot that will last maybe pass on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: Cuts bands. Only gives you about 6 shots before they fail.
customer_reviews.text: I baught this sling based on its looks and reviews. I would encorage anyone looking for a good sling shot to do more research. The bands only lasted about 6 shots. I would also recommend that you dissemble it and put it back together using blue lock tight. The entire frame is sloppy and loose. I modified mine to use flat bands and tied them on. The three small tube bands only lasted about 6 shots with very little power. I have since bought the Scout from Simple Shot. Check out Simple Shot for amazing sling shots.
customer_reviews.author: John Cloutier

customer_reviews.title: More of a toy. Low quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is garbage. Built like something from the .99 cent store. Flashlight flickers on and off. The bands are extremely cheap and doesn’t provide hardly any velocity. More of a kids toy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as Fast As Expected...
customer_reviews.text: I am replacing a single band cheapo slingshot, and assumed that since this was $$$x3 and had 3 bands, and said "Professional Hunting Slingshot with Heavy Duty Launching Bands, High Velocity"... it would be that... It shoots much slower than my old one, and lacks power! However, It is very well made, the bands come off easily for changing, but lacks power/speed. Not for hunting, or shooting over 20 feet to even chase unwanted rodents away.
customer_reviews.author: Fishing Nut

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Theater is a bit rough around the edges, but easy enough to assemble and very functional once it's worked out. It comes with clay ammunition but 99% of what I shoot is steel, and with steel it performs quite nicely. The bands have stretched a bit and now seem to be stable, which is to be expected for any surgical tubing slingshot. Like any hunting power slingshot proper form is important but this unit will put the balls where you want them to go if you do your part.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Bibliophile

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Went and tested this slingshot and the tubing snapped in the first hour or so, had to use the backup tubing. It feels like the little beads holding the tubing to the slingshot itself can be pulled through their slots. My cousin had a really wicked wrist rocket that did some damage. This slingshot feels nothing like that.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: Fun and accurate
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to get my kid outside. He loves to practice hitting Amazon cardboard boxes in the backyard (another option for recycling). With having to stay at home, it’s a motivator to spend some time outside. Purchased additional clay balls because they decompose in the grass. Had an issue with the item but the seller helped me out quickly. Comes with an extra rubber sling shot strap.
customer_reviews.author: MichSnow

customer_reviews.title: Better slingshots available . Rubber band snaps ur wrist every time
customer_reviews.text: It dosent shoot very strong at all and the rubber band where its placed snaps back and leaves red marks on my wrist and it hurts as u might imagine iv tried to send it back and cant BEWARE buying this product the daisy at the local store is better by far
customer_reviews.author: JayC

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for my application.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because the park we were tour guides at had a problem with nutria. Those buggers are tough and this didn't work, even close up and a head shot. After trapping them I had to dispatch them with a 22.
customer_reviews.author: Larry R. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Slingshot is good. Attachments are garbage
customer_reviews.text: First few shots were very powerful and accurate, but the rubber broke after less than 20 shots. The slingshot itself is very strong and comfortable to use, and it is the only reason this got more than 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: 3 band design is meh
customer_reviews.text: came with 2 tube sets. first one i was kinda rough with i guess, pulling back too far. broke one of the six tubes pretty quick. put second set on the handle, no breaks yet but using it more gently.
customer_reviews.author: Eko

customer_reviews.title: worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Really cool! Don't buy it for the flashlight though. It's cheap and you can't collapse the support arm with it attached. Very accurate, clay and steel balls included.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Only for tiny shot.....
customer_reviews.text: Okay. Besides shooting tiny pebbles. This thing is seriously lacking clearance below the bands at the fork. The fork should be at least 3⁄4 to an inch higher. I mainly got this to be able to shoot firecrackers over to my neighbor's property. At first l though it was so strong that the wicks came out midway during launch. Only to realize that they they were hitting the handle causing the wick to get jarred out. Soo yes. I am very disappointed with this product for what I got it for. When my last walmart crap for $10 worked fabulously. Cleared 5houses on my block.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I don't think this item is the real macoy.
customer_reviews.text: The feel of cheap quality alloy. Did not like how it felt on the wrist. I did not use it. " I think this is a Counterfit COOY. China copy."
customer_reviews.author: JOVENTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: almost  a  five star!!
customer_reviews.text: it would have got a perfect five stars if it hadn't been received with the extra band damaged. I got it last night so I haven't had it too long but have thoroughly enjoyed the experience so far it has shown to me that it is very accurate well crafted and the magnets on the back of the wrist brace genius I ran through the woods and did not lose one piece of ammo I've really enjoyed this I'm getting with them to find out what we can do to remedy the situation about the other power bands will write back see if they get the five stars or not all right guys enjoy
customer_reviews.author: Tizbot

customer_reviews.title: Decent slingshot
customer_reviews.text: Product looks and feels great. Not as powerful as I remember my other slingshot but I haven’t had any recent slingshot experiences to compare it to. One of the six bands broke. Re-tied to the pouch and seems to be working ok. The band ends that attach to the slingshot seem to be close to failing. Maybe I’m pulling the shot back too far.
customer_reviews.author: Jose M.

customer_reviews.title: Just a toy
customer_reviews.text: A toy. I only shot it once and am going to use it sparingly, because i dont know if itll last 100 shots. I suppose most of the cost is bundled into the gimmicks. It comes with pellets and a flashlight. I expected higher quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely poor workmanship. The arm brace is loose making it wobble, the handle halves fitted together create a seam that is rough and unfinished. Lastly the paint on it has bubbles in it. Overall, it looks cheap and shoddy. All this didn't instill confidence to shoot it. However, it did shoot it and it's pretty accurate. Frankly, it don't trust it with the tension of three bands per side so I reduced it to one band per side and use it on only targets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Received our product, it came with no instructions for correct and proper assembly and the flashlight it did come with was broken upon unpacking it. The slingshot itself is nice, however because of the other issues that is why I rated this purchase only 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: David Kristufek

customer_reviews.title: Lesser quality
customer_reviews.text: For the cost, I expected a better made product. The handle is okay, but the bands and all other attachments seem to be less than optimal.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph

customer_reviews.title: Never used one before
customer_reviews.text: Need to get better at using this. Haven’t mastered it. The ratings are based on my ability to use it, sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Krites

customer_reviews.title: Lack of quality
customer_reviews.text: No instructions. What kind of battery does the light take? How can users prolong life? Is there any safety instructions? I can put it together easily enough, that’s not the point. Lack of info demonstrates lack of pride in the product, ipso facto...I’m a little concerned on the end result of the product. I bought it as a gift, now I’m concerned to give it away. I’ve had sling shots before and see some red flags here. More to come.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian L.

customer_reviews.title: Slingshot 1: Racoon 0
customer_reviews.text: My brother f'd up that Mangy Rabid racoon pretty good with a 1/2" ball bearing from about 15 yrds out. He's came back around a few times since, but he limps like hes got a broken leg. The Racoon does not like this sling shot, but we do.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Cool but doesn’t shoot regular rocks.
customer_reviews.text: So it’s cool and all, easy set up and shooting. It looks cool, and shoots nice but only regular ammo. It does not shoot regular rocks like an average slingshot. The Y is not deep enough for you to just grab a rock and shoot it. Other than than rather unfortunate letdown, and the fact the tubing is smaller than I thought with a 3/16 OD it’s pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: sdawn12

customer_reviews.title: Broke way too quickly
customer_reviews.text: After getting used to having to aim to the left and way down, the straps broke soon after using it. I bought it a month ago and have taken it out just a couple times, and broke through the straps AND the replacement straps it came with. The handle became wobbly very quickly, I guess that’s why you get a screw key. I don’t recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Brando

customer_reviews.title: Love the slingshot, dislike the delivery.
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful, strong slingshot. I do wish it was a direction paper in it so I could be sure I put everything together right. also the delivery guy lied and said he handed it to us when he didn't. he left it in the door, which is fine, just don't like to be lied on.
customer_reviews.author: RikkiRLD

customer_reviews.title: Item defective
customer_reviews.text: Two(2) of the three(3) rubber strings on the left hand side of this slingshot broke after the second time using this. Very disappointing product. I could not really recommend this and have to look at another product.
customer_reviews.author: CPLee

customer_reviews.title: No assembly instructions!
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a sturdy slingshot but won't know till I get it put together. Foreign companies should be required to have a good knowledge of English for giving assembly instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Abilene Schnell

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: I really bought this slingshot for only one specific purpose and it didn’t happen to work for what I needed it for, but that has nothing to do with the slingshot itself at all. This thing is sturdy as can be actually it’s a very nice piece of craftsmanship. I was really surprised and impressed with the quality of it I would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Ron D

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price! Band size?
customer_reviews.text: I liked the sights, top and bottom, see pic 3. I like the size and sturdiness of this product. I dislike the band size. In pics 1 & 2 I added a pen to the pic to try to show the size of the bands. Yes, there are 3 bands on each side but they are mini sized. This product seems no more powerful than my daisy and it is not as accurate for me. I do recommend this product but don't expect much more power.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Newman

customer_reviews.title: Met my expectations
customer_reviews.text: To begin with, this is not a toy. This is a serious hunting and sporting weapon. I bought this slingshot to use as I do my professional horse hair dart board, eg: to test my reaction, sight, and aim. It has met all my expectations
customer_reviews.author: JMTCruz

customer_reviews.title: its ok...
customer_reviews.text: i like the craftmanship. the only thing i notice is that the rubber breaks so easily, when i received it and tested on it not even 30 mins. the rubber snaps. and torn., the black wrist handle kinda uncomfortable. so i guess you buyers decide.
customer_reviews.author: gwapps

customer_reviews.title: Solid Slingshot
customer_reviews.text: In general this is a solid slingshot. It is accurate, well-made, and I think it will last. My only concern -- it can't be folded/collapsed with the included flashlight mounted due to interference. Otherwise a great tool.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: This product does not feel good in my hand nor does it feel good shooting, The wrist brace is hard and not soft. The handle is heavy and clunky and does not fit right. I do not like it.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It's OK. Wooden part on handle made of plastic. Had to replace small bead at connecting end on strap cause it slipped threw the hole. Flash light made super cheap. Not worth what I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lauer

customer_reviews.title: Crap product.  Dangerous to user
customer_reviews.text: Crap. Sharp edges from unrelieved milling IMMEDIATELY cut through tubing bands where they go through the yoke. Dangerous to my eyes! I tried to smooth the rough edges but the pot metal it was made of broke completely off. Threw it away. Save your money and buy a USA made Wrist Rocket
customer_reviews.author: oldguy831

customer_reviews.title: Mandelorian
customer_reviews.text: Clamp for light was not a great fit, but overall pleased. Replaced beads in tubing with slightly larger ones because they slipped and I didn’t trust them. Simple safety modification...
customer_reviews.author: Yan880

customer_reviews.title: it shoots good, a lot of fun
customer_reviews.text: I had to smooth the slots and opening for the bands to go in as they had some sharp edges the would cut the bands. the flashlight is a good idea just that it is a cheaply made flashlight, but it do's work. I like the shot holder on the wrist brace, makes it easy to reload the wrist brace could be a bit bigger
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Great item for the price. Folds up tight, and fits nicely into inside pocket of my jacket, without noticable bulge. Bands are a little short if your draw length is over 28.5" imo. Shot over 1,000 marbles, no issues yet. Accuracy is consistently good.
customer_reviews.author: O'G

customer_reviews.title: It will do the job
customer_reviews.text: This item was quick to deliver and appears to be made well. The flash light however is cheaply made and doesn't always come on or stays on. Otherwise it is as described. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kbm92064

customer_reviews.title: Good, powerful slingshot
customer_reviews.text: This slingshot is what I had hoped it would be with one exception. I found the ammo pad too small for my hands and I kept dropping the ammo ball. Also, I had a great deal of difficulty centering larger ammo, like a small marble.
customer_reviews.author: James Pohl

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Rubber Straps, ripped on the 1st day!
customer_reviews.text: The slingshot body is of good quality but the rubber straps are made in china garbage, ripped on the 1st day. Will continue to search for a better solution.
customer_reviews.author: Gera

customer_reviews.title: As good as advertised, and better
customer_reviews.text: This was a hit right out of the box! One happy 10 year old. What a great sling shot. He was smacking pop cans right away. A great purchase for any kid at any age!
customer_reviews.author: Gary  Wn.

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not great...
customer_reviews.text: The frame is too short, projectiles your shooting will hit it. Distance isn't that great either.
customer_reviews.author: Big Mike

customer_reviews.title: Ok purchase
customer_reviews.text: Everything is in the package, but one of the replacement bands had the anchor missing from one side. No instruction and no information about replacement parts.
customer_reviews.author: don

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Very nice the band is a little better than the one from wish but they are about the same the band gets tangled after every fee shots
customer_reviews.author: Levi Dunham

customer_reviews.title: Look out varmints!
customer_reviews.text: A good sling shot for the money, not sure about having a flashlight on it but I guess it could come in handy.
customer_reviews.author: George M Melton Jr

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed slingshot.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for review. Like most it is poorly thought out, for the monies you get what you pay for folks.
customer_reviews.author: OldSchoolCollector

customer_reviews.title: Plastic handle
customer_reviews.text: Works great but the handle is made of plastic. Dropped it the first week I had it and the handle popped off.
customer_reviews.author: Vaz Man

customer_reviews.title: Dope
customer_reviews.text: Awesome awesome awesome. Difficult to not shoot maskless people in the ass but other than that I love it
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Schara

customer_reviews.title: MADE IN CHINA
customer_reviews.text: Not a word of English on the box. I sure hope this is not cheap pot metal that is going to break and cause a serious injury.
customer_reviews.author: S. Forest

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price. Could be improved for sure
customer_reviews.text: Really hard to aim, and I try to use rocks as ammo, and they hit the handle every now and then. I wish the opening has a 1/4” more space.
customer_reviews.author: D and B

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, I have no doubts this slingshot will last for several generations.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth D Bates

customer_reviews.title: Junk. Useless. Junk
customer_reviews.text: Lame. Crap. Junk. Even as a kids toy this thing would be boring crap. No power at all.
customer_reviews.author: Natural Mystic

customer_reviews.title: Fun challenge of skills
customer_reviews.text: This is so fun we all use it test our skills and it shots far great gift for a young teen
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our son (11) and this is truly heavy duty and he loves it. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: KrisE

customer_reviews.title: Quality sling shot
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Gave this to my 11 yr old for Cmas. His 21 yr old brother was just as impressed with it. Not a toy.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Lazaro Blas

customer_reviews.title: Nice slingshot
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice slingshot however, I don’t like the wrist support. It is flat and hard. It makes it somewhat uncomfortable on my arm. Also, there is not a way to tighten it so it gives. Aside from that it seems to be well built. It is attractive and functions very well.
customer_reviews.author: Rena

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Well made for the money..flash light attachment needs tp be put on and off when storing it...
customer_reviews.author: PETE

customer_reviews.title: Its GREAT if you know how to shoot!!
customer_reviews.text: Well I am sure that once I learn how to shoot with accuracy rodents beware!!!
customer_reviews.author: Virgil naveda

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to shoot
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you get extra bands. 2nd shot fresh out of the box and one of the bands broke...

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: Cheap piece of made in china crap, save your money. Rubber bands broke almost immediately

customer_reviews.title: Great

customer_reviews.title: You get every thing you need with this, including a spare sling
customer_reviews.text: Solid product, great design and build and easy to shoot

customer_reviews.title: You have to assemble it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for hunting squirrel with all year round.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: One of the rubber tubes is missing a bb to keep it from pulling out when stretched. One of the slots had something in it preventing the tube from being inserted, I cleaned it out with a knife.
customer_reviews.author: James l Ogden

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: nice little wrist rocket sling shot, great for compact game options for DIY
customer_reviews.author: David K. Randall

customer_reviews.title: Looks like I received a returned item
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a fairly decent slingshot however, The one I received looks like it was a returned item. Did not include the large alen wrench or the steel ammo. Past experience with amazon tells me it is not worth the hassle of try to return. Probably easier to just suck it up and buy a wrench and some ammo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my nephew. Now he’s becoming a good shot.
customer_reviews.author: paul marshal

customer_reviews.title: Is as pictured.  You get what you see in the ad.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made slingshot. Only drawback is that you can't fold it up with the flashlight attached. It must be removed to fold up for packing.
customer_reviews.author: OldDuffer

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Nice little thing and solid built. If the flashlight was beamed instead of standard it would be even better.
customer_reviews.author: Gary K.

customer_reviews.title: beware of bands
customer_reviews.text: very nice slingshot .but the bands leave alot to be desired.the first band broke on the 2nd shot.the next band broke on the 5th shot.ive had wrist rockets with single bands and usually get 2 00-300 shots before had band issues, i guess i can set it up on a shelf as a conversation piece cause it looks cool
customer_reviews.author: tim,s.e.kansas

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time good Packaging everything that it said it comes with came with it if you know how to shoot them then yeah you can be pretty deadly
customer_reviews.author: Micheal

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality etc but wish it had greater lb pull; the bands are bit small diameter.Great
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely nice and better quality than images reflect. Hubby and son love it.
customer_reviews.author: Joanie S. Sosa

customer_reviews.title: Garbage, both sets of bands broke within an hour
customer_reviews.text: When the first set of bands broke I gave it a second chance, that's what a backup is for. The second set broke as well. Both with less than 10 shots each. Complete garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: COOY Slingshot,Wrist Sling Rocket Professional Hunting Slingshot with Heavy Duty Launching Bands, High Velocity Catapult …
product_meta.description:
Professional Slingshot for outdoor and indoor target shooting and fitnesscatapult of fowling and fishing. It also can be treasured up as a slingshot collection.



Feature:

High hardness alloy frame

High-speed and high-tension triple rubber bands

Ergonomic handle Grip

Adjustable Solid Steel Frame



Package included:

1. Slingshot × 1

2. Replacement Rubber bands × 2

3. Screw Key × 3

4. Steel Slingshot Ammo Balls × 1

5. hard clay balls × 1

6. small flashlight combo × 1



Warning:

Keep safe. : Adult supervision required when used by children.
feature_bullets: POWERFUL -- Made by 6 rubber bands, the power is stronger than the other slingshots.

MWTAL BOBY AND WRIST Support FRAME DESIGN -- The design makes the ejection base more stable. Steady handle and wrist support frame play a greater ejection intensity. Ergonomic design, made the grip handle is more comfortable and easy to use.
REMOVABLE SMALL FLASHLINGHT DESIGN - -You can find all the targets in the night. Quickly and accurately hit the target.
APPLICATION-- Great for eye and attention training, entertainment, competition and hunting.
PACKAGE -- 1 slingshot with rubber band + 1 free spare rubber band + hard clay balls + Steel Ammo+ More professional equipment.
